nodes.text: Raxine was a female bounty hunter who operated during the rule of the Galactic Empire. At some point, Raxine paired up with fellow hunter Krestock to claim a bounty on the individual Philo. However, they had a disagreement regarding how to share out the proceeds of the bounty, so in order to resolve the dispute they decided to tear Philo in half, with whoever got the bigger half taking the larger share of the proceeds. Philo cried out in pain as they pulled him from either end and Raxine soon grew tired of his screams, so she shot him with her blaster.
